location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no.3245 of 1855 from Henry Anderson, Secretary to the Government of Bombay, to the Resident in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: The letter is an acknowledgement of receipt of the Resident in the Persian Gulf, Captain Arnold Kemball’s earlier letter, which was a report of his annual tour of the Arab coast of the Gulf. Anderson writes that the Government ‘generally approves’ of the report.
